plan.plan_title: Smoke Alarm Trigger on 18th Floor (UB City Vicinity)

steps.details: Initiate floor-by-floor evacuation using trained wardens and follow fire evacuation plan.
Confirm alarm with fire control and request immediate dispatch of tenders and ladder units.
Prepare ambulances at nearest safe perimeter for potential casualties.
Manage evacuees in secure holding zones to prevent re-entry and ensure accountability.
Building management to provide floor plans, hazardous material locations, and access to fire teams.
Police to set up safety perimeter to allow emergency vehicle access and protect public.
Route traffic via Kasturba Rd and other parallel links to alleviate CBD congestion.
Enforce no-parking and remove obstructions on approach roads used by fire services.
Broadcast road closures and advise commuters to avoid the area.
Ensure fire crews have unobstructed access to hydrants and critical building infrastructure.

plan.plan_title: Power Isolation & Backup Activation (UB City Block)

steps.details: Fire command to coordinate with electrical team to cut supply and prevent electrical hazards.
Start backup generators for critical systems like emergency lighting and fire pumps where safe.
Prohibit elevators until fire teams clear and declare them safe.
Post-incident electrical inspection before re-energising the building.
Advise tenant companies on data protection and access to essential services while isolation persists.
